name: Actuit India
tag_list: business, accounting, services, bookkeeping, taxation, final-accounts, cfo-services
overview:
Actuit (Acting Intuitively) India is a offshore back office service provider in the vertical of Finance, Accounts, Bookkeeping, Tax Return and bankruptcy petition preparation services. We provide services:

To CPA / CA / CGA firms in USA/UK and Canada To Small to Large Business Accounting Services Attorneys in bankruptcy and personal injury practices Actuitâ€™s Resource Center is a complete business center for businesses irrespective of size. i.e. for small businesses to large corporate to outsource all or a portion of their non key processes for their respective businesses. Your non core activities are our key business activities, thereby, you can depend on us.

Actuit provide business professionals to handle your process, let it be working as a paralegal assistant, an accountant or CFO to your business.

We manage your day to day business activities as per your unique business needs. Our reporting system helps you to take control of the process all your accounting, bookkeeping, banking, accounts receivable, payable and sales activities on real time basis.

As seasoned service provide we deploy experienced manpower to understand your business and they work closely with your team.

Our services not only will reduces your cost but also enables you to focus on more critical functions of your business, like your customers by providing you reliable completed work on time for you to act.
